def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = arr[1]
    curr_max = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        curr_max = max(arr[i], curr_max + arr[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = arr[-1]
    curr_max = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        curr_max = max(arr[i], curr_max + arr[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = arr[0]
    curr_max = arr[0]
    for i in range(-1, len(arr)):

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = arr[0]
    curr_max = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        curr_max = max(arr[i], curr_max - arr[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = arr[0]
    curr_max = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        curr_max = max(arr[i], curr_max * arr[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far
